channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- OpenShift Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- OpenShift Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2018-1069|2024-08-05T03:51:47.337Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- openshift%20enterprise
item.description: Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise version 3.7 is vulnerable to access control override for container network filesystems. An attacker could override the UserId and GroupId for GlusterFS and NFS to read and write any data on the network filesystem.
